title: 786: BITCOIN WILL HIT $100K - HERE’S WHEN, ACCORDING TO TOP CRYPTO EXPERTS!! BTC SHEDS DUMB MONEY!!
description:
Most analyst are predicting $100K Bitcoin in Q1 or Q2 of 2022, or even sooner as predicted by Plan B:

“I guess we will be above $100,000 [or] above $135,000 at the end of the year, and we’ll continue to grow maybe towards the S2FX model targets, $288,000 or even above. I would not be surprised even to see in Q1 or Q2 next year, prices of $300,000, $400,000, $500,000…”

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
